topic.title: Session Objective
topic.text:
• Identify the basic peripherals needed to start up a computer system
  • Connect the basic peripherals to a computer system unit
  • Start up the computer system

topic.title: Introduction
topic.text: Welcome to the session on Connecting Basic Peripheral Devices. This session will teach you how to connect basic peripheral devices and start up a computer system.

topic.title: System Unit
topic.text: This is the system unit. It is the main part of the computer system and houses the Central Processing Unit (CPU), motherboard, memory, storage devices, expansion cards and the power supply.
